article_title: BCC, Southcoast secure grant funding for medical assistant training
article_text:
Herald News Staff Reporter Follow @@debsallard By Deborah Allard Herald News Staff Reporter

Posted May. 9, 2016 at 11:19 AM

article_metadata.description:
FALL RIVER — A partnership between Bristol Community College and Southcoast Health has resulted in the certification of more than 100 medical assistants in the last year.
The assistants, all employees of doctors in the Southcoast Physicians Network, found themselves in a sticky predicament.
They needed credentials to remain in their jobs.
